html.p: This dashboard shows risk objects that could not be matched to a corresponding unique identifier in the Idenity information, it could be that a use case is recording risk modifiers against a machine account or group mailbox, but it could equally indicate incomplete identity information.

Any information in this dashboard relating to an actual person means that we are unable to tie all their personas back to a single identity for correlation and should be reviewed as it means some or all of their behaviour is not factored into the threshold calculations and Insider alerting.

search.query: index=it_risk | `get_identity4insiderevents(risk_object)`|`unique_identifier_extraction(risk_object)`|where isnull(risk_object_unique_identifier) | stats count AS "No. Risk Modifiers",sum(risk_score) AS "Total",sparkline(sum(risk_score)) AS "Risk Score" by risk_object | rename risk_object AS "Risk Object"
